```{r}
# Hints:

# or you can use apply() on subsets of columns
apply(Auto[,1:5],MARGIN=2,FUN=range)
# or we can name the output of range and call apply
myr <- function(x) {
  out <- range(x)
  names(out) <- c("min","max")
  out
}
apply(Auto[,1:5],MARGIN=2,FUN=myr)
```
